definition: (chemistry) mass transfer (as observed in processes like evaporation, distillation and membrane filtration)
to pass on/to spread/to transmit/to infect/to transfer/to circulate/to conduct (electricity)

sentences.english: Separation processes can essentially be termed as mass transfer processes.
sentences.chinese: 分離過程本質上可以稱之爲傳質過程。

sentences.english: The axial or radial distribution of mass transfer coefficients is uniformity.
sentences.chinese: 傳質係數在軸徑向上分佈均勻。

sentences.english: The transfer rate equation is experimentally obtained and the superficial transfer energy is calculated.
sentences.chinese: 並求得初始傳質速率方程，計算了表觀傳質反應熱。

sentences.english: The transfer rate equation is experimentally obtained and the superficial transfer energy is calculated.
sentences.chinese: 並求得初始傳質速率方程，計算了表觀傳質反應熱。

sentences.english: Drop diameter distribution and mass transfer coefficient are briefly introduced.
sentences.chinese: 對滴徑分佈和傳質係數也作了簡單介紹。

sentences.english: The utility model relates to an ultra-intense turbulent current mass transfer tower.
sentences.chinese: 本實用新型涉及一種超強湍流傳質塔。

sentences.english: The influences of hydrologic condition and air pressure on oxygen transfer ability were studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了水力條件和曝氣壓強對氧傳質能力的影響。

sentences.english: Rotating Packed Bed (RPB) is a new type of mass transfer equipment.
sentences.chinese: 旋轉牀是一種新型的傳質設備。

sentences.english: The paper introduced that the packed column influences mass transfer when it is emulsifying.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了填料塔乳化操作時對傳質的影響。

sentences.english: The thickness of the ultra-intense turbulent current mass transfer field is controlled by the maze structure.
sentences.chinese: 並通過迷宮結構控制超強湍流傳質場的厚度。

sentences.english: Through analyzing on experimental result, the mechanism of permanent magnetic field on the molecular mass-transfer process in gas phase was discussed.
sentences.chinese: 對磁場影響氣體中分子傳質過程的機理進行了探討。

sentences.english: Mass transfer mathematic model of carbon dioxide removal by sterically hindered amine has established.
sentences.chinese: 建立了空間位阻胺脫碳的傳質數學模型。

sentences.english: Smaller diameter particles was indicated for enhancing gas-liquid mass transfer as compared to larger diameter particles.
sentences.chinese: 微粒的粒徑越小，對氣液傳質增強越大。

sentences.english: This ability rests largely on a proficiency in the science of mass transfer.
sentences.chinese: 這種能力主要得益於對傳質這門學科的熟練。

sentences.english: Mass transfer model was presented and prediction value and experimental value were compared.
sentences.chinese: 建立膜接觸器傳質模型，比較預測值與實驗值。

sentences.english: The higher transfer resistance and relative unstability are the shortcomings.
sentences.chinese: 其主要缺點是膜的傳質阻力較大和不穩定性等。
